Abstrak: The research tried to measure the implementation level in X using the Corporate Entrepreneurship approach. Entrepreneurial Orientation Survey, a questionnaire used to measure the organization orientation to corporate entrepreneurship, was used as the primary tool. An extra questionnaire which asked the employees about their subjective appraisal to the T Attitude was also added in the reearch.
Kata Kunci: Environmental Turbulence, T Attitude, Corporate Entrepreneurship
